Package org.optim4j.ns

Class AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.Scores

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.optim4j.ns.AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.Scores
  • Enclosing class:
    AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T>
    public static class AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.Scores
extends java.lang.Object
    An encapsulation of all types of scores for repairers and destroyers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private double initialScore
      Initial score.
      private double scoreIncrementWhenNeighborAcceptable
      Score increment when the neighbor is not better than either best or current agent but is acceptable according to acceptance criteria.
      private double scoreIncrementWhenNeighborBetterThanBest
      Score increment when the neighbor is better than best agent.
      private double scoreIncrementWhenNeighborBetterThanCurrent
      Score increment when the neighbor is better than current agent.
